com.adidas.ui.imagecrop.photoview

Class PhotoViewAttacher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adidas.ui.imagecrop.photoview.PhotoViewAttacher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnTouchListener, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnGlobalLayoutListener, OnGestureListener, IPhotoView

    public class PhotoViewAttacher
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPhotoView, android.view.View.OnTouchListener, OnGestureListener, android.view.ViewTreeObserver.OnGlobalLayoutListener

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  PhotoViewAttacher.IGetImageBounds
      Used for calculating crop overlay
      static interface  PhotoViewAttacher.OnMatrixChangedListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the internal Matrix has changed for this View.
      static interface  PhotoViewAttacher.OnPhotoTapListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the Photo is tapped with a single tap.
      static interface  PhotoViewAttacher.OnViewTapListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the ImageView is tapped with a single tap.

      • setOnDoubleTapListener

        public void setOnDoubleTapListener(android.view.GestureDetector.OnDoubleTapListener newOnDoubleTapListener)
        Description copied from interface: IPhotoView
        Sets custom double tap listener, to intercept default given functions. To reset behavior to default, you can just pass in "null" or public field of PhotoViewAttacher.defaultOnDoubleTapListener
        Specified by:
        setOnDoubleTapListener in interface IPhotoView
        Parameters:
        newOnDoubleTapListener - custom OnDoubleTapListener to be set on ImageView

      • cleanup

        public void cleanup()
        Clean-up the resources attached to this object. This needs to be called when the ImageView is no longer used. A good example is from View.onDetachedFromWindow() or from Activity.onDestroy().

        Deprecated. use setRotationTo(float)
        Description copied from interface: IPhotoView

        Specified by:

      • setZoomable

        public void setZoomable(boolean zoomable)
        Description copied from interface: IPhotoView
        Allows you to enable/disable the zoom functionality on the ImageView. When disable the ImageView reverts to using the FIT_CENTER matrix.
        Specified by:
        setZoomable in interface IPhotoView
        Parameters:
        zoomable - - Whether the zoom functionality is enabled.

      • setZoomTransitionDuration

        public void setZoomTransitionDuration(int milliseconds)
        Description copied from interface: IPhotoView
        Allows to change zoom transition speed, default value is 200 (PhotoViewAttacher.DEFAULT_ZOOM_DURATION). Will default to 200 if provided negative value
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • getIPhotoViewImplementation

        public IPhotoView getIPhotoViewImplementation()
        Description copied from interface: IPhotoView

        Specified by:
        getIPhotoViewImplementation in interface IPhotoView
        Returns:
